The answer is D: Reports relayed by the host that people in Ireland were upset and ready to throw “potatoes and shit” at her (event 8).

The speaker mentions in event 13 that she is going back to New York because she received reports from the host about the backlash she faced in Ireland. Specifically, she was told that people in Ireland were so angry with her that they were ready to throw potatoes and other things at her. This situation made her feel stressed and uncomfortable, leading her to make the decision to return to New York.

The answer is C: The host's report that people in Ireland were upset and ready to throw “potatoes and shit” at her (event 8). This event likely prompted the strict concert policy to ensure the safety of all attendees.
